Payment and Shipping
// About Us About
Living Fruits
Blueberries Blueberries like no other
Our tasty, nutritious blueberries are spray free, hand picked and packed on site. Our regular customers love the flavour and sweetness of our blueberries ... and keep coming back for more.Available November to March

 We follow recognised quality processes in bringing the freshest and best quality fruit to you (NZGAP accredited).


Our story
Living Fruits is a hands-on, family owned and run orchard/business.Sue and Murray run the farm and their daughter, Amy, helps out, having recently moved back to Kerikeri with her husband and three children. 

 In 2002, we bought our 4.6 Ha block 10 minutes north of Kerikeri and planted our blueberries. 

 We love the lifestyle, growing healthy fruits and vegetables, and it's a great place for our children and grandchildren to come home to. 


// Contact Sue & Maurray Nash 71E Keri Downs Road

 Northland 0294 We'd love to hear from you.
